isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL 4X2 AND 6X4 SPRING SUSPENSION WITH TORQUE RODS - INSPECTION AND CLEANING

svcproc.title: INSPECTION AND CLEANING
svcproc.para: Inspect spring leaves for breakage or cracks. Also compare arch of spring leaves with new spring leaves if available. Spring leaves which have lost arch or are cracked or broken should be replaced.

note.para: If torque rod mounting studs are removed, apply Loctite Heavy Duty Lock 'N Seal No. 277 (Red) to the stud threads. New studs are already coated.

caution.para: Do not immerse torque rod or equalizer bearing rubber bushings in cleaning solvent if they are to be re-used. Use a non-petroleum base type rubber lubricant on a clean cloth to wipe rubber bushings clean.
